title: Gibberish!
content:
Help! Does anybody know what font this is or what this might say or mean? Any info helps. Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823020120im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gibberish_01_4000.jpg)
author: kvnrangel

comments.content: very interesting. i found similar shapes in the [Shaw Alphabet for Writers](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823020120/http:/www.linguism.co.uk/language/english-spelling-reform)
if the above is correct, could also be helpful to visit [Luc Devroye's page on the subject](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823020120/http:/luc.devroye.org/shavian.html) as well.
thank you defiantone! this helped a ton!
